value.title: Prepare your cloud environments using Azure landing zones | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Brian Blanchard joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure landing zones and how you can prepare your destination Azure environmentâ€”not only to receive migrating applications, but also to balance agility, governance, and security considerations.  0:00 - Overview 0:38 - What is an Azure landing zone? 5:05

value.title: Protect your web applications using WAF with Azure Front Door | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Sharad Agrawal and Teresa Yao join Scott Hanselman to introduce Web Application Firewall (WAF) with Azure Front Door. They show how to configure and block malicious attacks against web applications at the edge of Microsoft's network. WAF with Azure Front Door is the best solution to help protect your

value.title: What is Azure Sentinel and why you should care | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn what Azure Sentinel is and how to use it. Azure Sentinel provides a threat detection and mitigation service that helps you to detect incident and threats when they happen and helps you to solve them as effectively as possible.    For more tips and
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/dRpOR2GpL1s" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Build the intelligent edge with Azure IoT Edge
value.excerpt: Follow this learning path for a broad and compelling introduction to the fundamentals of building IoT solutions with Azure IoT.

topItems.title: Deploy a pre-built module to the Edge device
Set up an IoT Edge Gateway
topItems.excerpt: This module is theoretical and will walk you through how an IoT Edge device can be used as a gateway.

value.title: Implement a Data Streaming Solution with Azure Streaming Analytics
value.excerpt: In this learning path, discover Azure Stream Analytics streaming data, the concepts of event processing, and integration of Internet of Things (IoT) devices.

topItems.title: Work with data streams by using Azure Stream Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Explore how Azure Stream Analytics integrates with your applications or Internet of Things devices to gain insights with real-time streaming data.

topItems.title: Enable reliable messaging for Big Data applications using Azure Event Hubs
topItems.excerpt: Learn to use Azure Event Hubs to reliably process high-volume data streams to enable you to code applications to send and receive messages through the hub.

topItems.title: Ingest data streams with Azure Stream Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create Azure Stream Analytics jobs to process input data, transform it with a query, and return results.

value.title: Optimize query performance in SQL Server
value.excerpt: Analyze individual query performance and determine where improvements can be made. Explore performance-related Dynamic Management Objects. Investigate how indexes and database design affect queries.

topItems.title: Describe SQL Server query plans
topItems.excerpt: Read and understand various forms of execution plans. Compare estimated vs actual plans. Learn how and why plans are generated.

topItems.title: Evaluate performance improvements
topItems.excerpt: Evaluate possible changes to indexes. Determine the impact of changes to queries and indexes. Explore relevant Dynamic Management Objects.

topItems.title: Explore performance-based design
topItems.excerpt: Evaluate possible changes to indexes. Determine the impact of changes to queries and indexes. Explore relevant Dynamic Management Objects.

value.title: Use basketball stats to optimize game play with Visual Studio Code, inspired by SPACE JAM: A NEW LEGACY
value.excerpt: This *Space Jam: A New Legacy* - inspired learning path aims to equip you with data science, web development skills, and coding strategies to impact a game of basketball in real time, ensuring victory for the Tune Squad in their next game.

topItems.title: Create a web app that uses data to make decisions on the basketball court
topItems.excerpt: Create a web app by using JavaScript, Azure, GitHub, and Visual Studio Code to help the Tune Squad coach use data to make decisions on the basketball court, inspired by SPACE JAM: A NEW LEGACY.

topItems.title: Build an AI web app by using Python and Flask
topItems.excerpt: Use Python, Flask, and Azure Cognitive Services to build a web app that incorporates AI

value.title: Deploy a containerized application on Azure Kubernetes Service
value.excerpt: Explore how to create and deploy a containerized application by using Azure Kubernetes Service declarative manifest files.

value.title: Dynamically meet changing web app performance requirements with autoscale rules
value.excerpt: Respond to periods of high activity by incrementally adding resources, and then removing these resources when activity drops, to reduce costs.

value.title: Automate DevOps processes by using GitHub Apps
value.excerpt: Learn to automate DevOps processes by using GitHub Apps that handle repetitive tasks, enforce team policies, and maintain a tidy repository.

value.title: Automate GitHub by using GitHub Script
value.excerpt: Learn to interact with the GitHub API from GitHub Actions by using GitHub Script.

value.title: Introduction to blockchain on Azure
value.excerpt: Introduction to blockchain on Azure. See how blockchain allows business partners to trust each other's data without a central authority. You'll also learn a bit about how blockchain works. The goal is to help you decide if blockchain is a good choice for your scenario.

value.title: Introduction to Azure Logic Apps
value.excerpt: Learn how to evaluate Logic Apps as an automation choice for your organization using criteria for integration, performance, conditionals, and connectors.

value.title: Secure your data with Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Secure your data with Azure SQL

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Reliability
value.excerpt: Learn how to recover from infrastructure and service failure, loss of data, and disasters by incorporating reliability into your architecture.

value.title: Learn how to use Solidity
value.excerpt: Discover how Solidity can help you program smart contracts for the Ethereum blockchain platform.

value.title: Write Ethereum smart contracts by using Solidity
value.excerpt: Learn how to install tools that you can use to develop smart contracts.

value.title: Communicate between applications with Azure Queue storage
value.excerpt: Find out to use Azure Queue storage to handle high demand and improve resilience in your distributed applications.

value.title: Configure security policies to manage data
value.excerpt: Learn how to set up policies to classify, retain, and protect your cloud-based data.

value.title: Create and host web sites by using GitHub Pages
value.excerpt: Learn how to host your personal, organization, and project sites for free with GitHub Pages.

value.title: Create your first Azure IoT Central app
value.excerpt: This module builds an IoT Central app to monitor and command a refrigerated truck. The first unit creates the app, the second unit defines a device template for a refrigerated truck. Then, create a programming project, add code to simulate a truck, and communicate with your IoT Central app. The truck is monitored through a custom dashboard.

value.title: Deploy a pre-built module to the Edge device
value.excerpt: University of Oxford

value.title: Describe Azure Databricks Delta Lake architecture
value.excerpt: Describe Azure Databricks Delta Lake architecture

value.title: Describe SQL Server query plans
value.excerpt: Read and understand various forms of execution plans. Compare estimated vs actual plans. Learn how and why plans are generated.

value.title: Design a data warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Learn how to create a data warehouse in Azure Synapse Analytics in minutes to take advantage of massively parallel processing (MPP) and run complex queries at petabyte scale quickly

value.title: Enable reliable messaging for Big Data applications using Azure Event Hubs
value.excerpt: Learn to use Azure Event Hubs to reliably process high-volume data streams to enable you to code applications to send and receive messages through the hub.

value.title: Encrypt network traffic end to end with Azure Application Gateway
value.excerpt: Secure the traffic from your users all the way to your web servers by enabling TLS encryption on Application Gateway.

value.title: Evaluate performance improvements
value.excerpt: Evaluate possible changes to indexes. Determine the impact of changes to queries and indexes. Explore relevant Dynamic Management Objects.

value.title: Explore and analyze time-stamped data with Time Series Insights
value.excerpt: Azure Time Series Insights allows you to collect, process, store, analyze, and query data at Internet Of Things (IoT) scale. Learn how to deploy this service and use it to gain insights from data generated by IoT devices.

value.title: Explore the services and identity types of Azure AD
value.excerpt: Explore the services and identity types of Azure AD
